task.title: Taak: Closing Excel
task.shortdesc: Instructions on how to close the Excel window.

context.p:
There are two methods to stop working with Excel and closing the program window:
Through the close button of the program window. This is a button with an X in the upper right corner of the window.
Though thet menu File Close .
context.note: When something is changed in de workbook, you allways get a dialog window asking whether the changes should or should not be saved.

step.cmd: Close Excel with one of these methods.
